review: Very happy.  Set up was easy, the remote is nice and simple to work - has a fairly fast response time.
author: Rob Palulis

review: Set up was fast and easy. The product comes with everything you need - even batteries for the remote! Works great!
author: Susan M. Perreault

review: I just received my Fire Stick in the mail so I haven't had a chance to do a lot with it just yet. It was super easy to set up so you don't need to be a technology junkie to use it. I purchased this item mainly to utilize my Netflix and Prime memberships and so far so good.
author: Brian Retone

review: It never stays connected to the internet.  It always gives me the error "connected with problems".  My router is less than 10 feet away from it.  Worse purchase yet for me by far!
author: Amazon Customer

review: The Fire stick meets all my needs. Very easy to set up, hides neatly behind mt TV. I highly recommend it!
author: kmeyers
